name: @agtm/nuxt-form
description: Gerador de Formulário para o nuxt framework

scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push
scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push

author: André Timermann <andre@timermann.com.br> (http://andre.timermann.com.br)
